title: Vintage Y2K London Trash LT-Monsta Leopard Stiletto Platform Booties 7.5
listperfectly_description:
Vintage Y2K London Trash LT-Monsta leopard platform booties built for nights out and statement looks in size 7.5.

Vintage Y2K leopard pony hair ankle boots with wrap-around leather straps, buckle, and a towering stiletto heel; real fur upper with a bold goth-glam vibe and purple outsole.

You will receive the following item(s):
- Women's Heels / Boots (pair)

Measurements:
- Size / Fit: US 7.5 / UK 5.5 / EU 38.5 / AU 7.5 / Width Reg
- Outsole length (heel-to-toe): 10.8 in (27.3 cm)
- Outsole width (widest): 3.5 in (8.9 cm)
- Insole length (heel to toe): 9.8 in (24.8 cm)
- Insole width (ball area): 3.2 in (8.1 cm)
- Heel height: 6.5 in (16.5 cm)
- Platform height (forefoot): 2.3 in (5.7 cm)
- Toe box height: 1.5 in (3.8 cm)
- Shaft height (from outsole): 6 in (15.2 cm)
- Shaft opening (circumference): 12 in (30.5 cm)
- Weight (pair): 3.40 lb (1.54 kg)

Photos show condition and measurements; ask if you need a specific angle or detail confirmed—grab them before they're gone.
